ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
libev:
- '4.33'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - python
  - channel_sources

about.description:
A screamingly fast, ultra-lightweight WSGI server for CPython 2 and CPython
3, written in C using Marc Lehmann's high performance
`libev <http://software.schmorp.de/pkg/libev.html>`_ event loop and Ryan
Dahl's `http-parser <https://github.com/joyent/http-parser>`_.
about.summary: A screamingly fast Python 2/3 WSGI server written in C.

about.description:
A screamingly fast, ultra-lightweight WSGI server for CPython 2 and CPython
3, written in C using Marc Lehmann's high performance
`libev <http://software.schmorp.de/pkg/libev.html>`_ event loop and Ryan
Dahl's `http-parser <https://github.com/joyent/http-parser>`_.
about.summary: A screamingly fast Python 2/3 WSGI server written in C.

name: bjoern

about.description:
A screamingly fast, ultra-lightweight WSGI server for CPython 2 and CPython
3, written in C using Marc Lehmann's high performance
`libev <http://software.schmorp.de/pkg/libev.html>`_ event loop and Ryan
Dahl's `http-parser <https://github.com/joyent/http-parser>`_.
about.summary: A screamingly fast Python 2/3 WSGI server written in C.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "bjoern" %}
{% set version = "3.2.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 16e5a02a9a17a7f5f8bea0d7c58650e78ab80ead6fe3e390037573d4355baf31

build:
  number: 4
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}
  host:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - pip
    - libev
  run:
    - python
    - libev

test:
  imports:
    - bjoern

about:
  home: https://github.com/jonashaag/bjoern
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A screamingly fast Python 2/3 WSGI server written in C.
  description: |
    A screamingly fast, ultra-lightweight WSGI server for CPython 2 and CPython
    3, written in C using Marc Lehmann's high performance
    `libev <http://software.schmorp.de/pkg/libev.html>`_ event loop and Ryan
    Dahl's `http-parser <https://github.com/joyent/http-parser>`_.
  dev_url: https://github.com/jonashaag/bjoern

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - carlodri
